title: files/folders missing after upgrading 4.5.7 to 5.x
body:
after an upgrade from my working 4.5.7 installation to 5.x i'm missing folders/files. 
only the first, called "az" is accessible and visible. all others are missing, but still existing in the filesystem.
"shared" also disappeared.

the migration wizard showed no error.

the only "errors" after the migration in my log:
error	 core	 can't remove app files_archive. it is not installed.	 12.03.2013 09:05:18
error	 core	 app "" (files_archive) can't be used because it is not compatible with this version of owncloud	 12.03.2013 09:05:18

here the output from ls in the filesystem (owncloud installed in /var/www/oc and the user is joh):

/var/www/oc/data/joh/files

 ls -al
total 48k
drwxr-xr-x 12 www-data www-data 4.0k mar 11 15:02 .
drwxr-xr-x  9 www-data www-data 4.0k nov 12 13:49 ..
drwxr-xr-x  5 www-data www-data 4.0k mar 11 07:57 az
drwxr-xr-x 69 www-data www-data 4.0k mar  4 15:01 bilder
drwxr-xr-x  2 www-data www-data 4.0k mar  4 13:47 bilder-mobil
drwxr-xr-x  3 www-data www-data 4.0k feb 21 07:38 cicero
drwxr-xr-x  4 www-data www-data 4.0k feb 18 16:21 linuxuser-magazin
drwxr-xr-x  2 www-data www-data 4.0k dec 19 08:22 music
drwxr-xr-x  2 www-data www-data 4.0k mar 11 15:02 octemp
drwxr-xr-x  2 www-data www-data 4.0k jan 24 14:46 pdfs
drwxr-xr-x  2 www-data www-data 4.0k nov 14 10:09 sns-austausch
drwxr-xr-x  4 www-data www-data 4.0k mar 10 11:03 wissen

interesting, "bilder" (pictures) are shown in the pictures application.

verfied browsers chrome 26.0.1410.28 and firefox 19.0.2 both linux x86_64

help!
